edu.usc.pgroup.goffish.gofs.utilities.partitioning

Interface IPartitioner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GMLMetisPartitioner

    public interface IPartitioner

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<ISerializablePartition> getPartitions()
      Returns an Iterable of partitions that are suitable for writing to disk.
      void partition(int numPartitions)
      This will partition some input graph (input format is implementation dependant) into the given number of partitions.

    • Method Detail

      • partition

        void partition(int numPartitions)
               throws IOException
        This will partition some input graph (input format is implementation dependant) into the given number of partitions. Specific implementations may be able to choose the number of partitions themselves, but this is not guaranteed. This method must be called only once, and before getPartitions() is ever called.
        Parameters:
        numPartitions - The number of partitions to split the input graph into
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPartitions

        Iterable<ISerializablePartition> getPartitions()
                                               throws IOException
        Returns an Iterable of partitions that are suitable for writing to disk. It is encouraged that implementations return partitions from the Iterable on demand so that it is possible to keep only a single partition in memory at once.
        Returns:
        An Iterable of partitions in a serializable format
        Throws:
        IOException
